cn.description:
多赚会花每一天，记账就要随手记！个人、家庭、生意账随心选。
记账快捷又专业，轻松管理多人记账。多维度账单解读，全面了解你的财务状况。账单数据实时存，云端数据不丢失。

【神象云账本】
- 记一笔记账快捷又专业
- 账本首页流水页，数据呈现更清晰
- 云端存储数据，安全不丢失
- 账本操作必留痕，安全又省心

【海量账本模板，陪伴你的各个人生阶段】
to成长中的你：
- 高中生、大学生账本：生活费聪明花，课外兼职也能记
- 班费账本：班委管钱大家看，班费收支更透明
to工作中的你：
- 差旅报销流水账：流水详尽不漏报
- 网约司机、健身教练、装修队长：职业账本专属定制
to爱生活的你：
- 合租、恋爱、生活账：日常生活随心记
- 旅游、宠物、爱好账：为自己所爱的事物，记录美好回忆
- 攒钱、健身、目标账：设定一个小目标，让账本陪你变成想要的样子
to创业中的你：
- 奶茶、快餐、餐饮业：店铺经营实用工具
- 服装、代购、零售业：成本营收全把控，应收应付不遗漏
- 培训、酒店、服务业：各行各业全覆盖，首页报表指导经营
to顾家的你：
- 人情账本、结婚账本：人情红包收入支出一览无余
- 儿童教育、宝宝账本：家人共享宝贝成长点滴
- 汽车、储蓄家庭账本：日常生活分类全，全家合记一本账
还有更多账本模板等你发现！

【专业记账，省心易用】
- 记一笔：多人协同共同记账，随时随地记一笔
- 账本首页：首页即报表，数据卡片及图表让财务状况一目了然
- 流水：从各个维度查看收支情况，拒绝糊涂账
- 账户：全面了解你的各账户余额，手有余粮心不慌

————献给热爱记账的你————
生活需要一点仪式感。 有人每天早上一定要喝一杯咖啡， 有人每天睡前一定要写两句日记， 也有人每天都把挣到的和花过的每一分钱记录下来 在快节奏的时代，扫一扫就完成付款，动动手指就能解决三餐、完成购物。 移动支付把生活中的花销从实实在在的钱变成了一串变动的数字，很多时候我们对于花钱没有了概念，甚至，想不起来把钱花在了哪里。 这时，需要消费后的用心记账，提高自己对钱的敏感度。 希望热爱记账的你梳理财务状况的时候可以沉浸在随手记这个“工作台”！

【联系我们】 使用过程中如遇问题，欢迎联系我们，可爱的客服妹纸会认真处理你的每一个反馈哦。
- 在线客服："我的"-"求助反馈"-“功能咨询”/“业务咨询”

cn.trackName: 灵体侦测器: 能量、超自然现象幽灵探测器器
cn.releaseNotes: Added support for sharing the app via QR code.
cn.description:
这个应用程序有一个简单的功能：检测灵体的存在并捕捉它们。
一旦捕获，它会显示东方佛教的六字箴言作为保护和祝福用户的形式。

• 这个应用程序可能会吓到你。
• 所有传感器都在一个页面上。
• 一个真正的雷达来追踪异常。
• 高精度的EMF（电磁场）探测器。
• 拍照并检测其中的异常 - 可以自由开启或关闭。
• 更详细的说明在应用程序中可用；只需触摸?按钮即可访问它们。

警告：
如果您是一个非常敏感或容易受到惊吓的个体，请考虑不使用这个应用程序并将其关闭。在使用此应用程序时，请不要将自己置于危险中。如果您认为自己处于危险之中，请立即关闭应用程序，联系某人寻求帮助，并立即离开该地区。

免责声明：
请记住，由于应用程序使用设备的不同传感器，因此我们不能保证任何鬼魂检测的准确性，这在很大程度上取决于终端的精度和质量。由于超自然活动无法用科学证明，我们不能保证该应用程序与真实的灵魂进行通信。这个应用程序的结果无法得到科学验证。

cn.description:
Apple 的年度应用在全球范围内下载次数超过 1500 万次，获得 20 万个 5 星级评分，Day One 重塑了日记功能，让您可以随时记录日常生活。 在全球最值得信赖的数字日记中安全地保存音频、视频、照片、笔记等内容。

“Day One 创造了一个非常罕见，甚至让人感觉神圣的东西：一个完全私人的数字空间。”-《纽约时报》

“Day One 使写日记变成了一件轻松愉快的事。”- Wired

“这款出色的日记应用程序仍然美观、易于使用，并且对于任何竞争对手来说都是一个难以超越的强大产品。”- Macworld

为什么选择 DAY ONE？

Day One 是一款原创日记应用。经过十年不懈的更新和新增功能，使它成为世界上最私密、最值得信任和最易于使用的日记记录平台。

易于使用，让您爱不释手

• 备受赞誉的美观设计
• 无限的文本日记条目
• 无限量照片和视频*
•功能强大的富文本格式，带有 Markdown 功能
• 不同的日记类型适用于记录您生活的方方面面*

私密且安全

• 自动备份可确保日记条目的安全性
• 端到端加密，这是一种确保日记条目完全私密的巧妙方式
•日记条目使用密码或 TouchID 来保证安全性
•多个导出选项（pdf、纯文本、JSON 等）确保您的日记条目永远属于您

养成习惯并坚持下去

•可编程的提醒通知
• 独特的每日日记提示功能有助于避免日记中断
•可自定义的模板可节省时间，并可向日记条目中添加组织
• 通过今日视图，您可以大致了解您去过哪里，做了什么

随时随地写日记

• 可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用的跨平台应用
• 能够直接向您的日记发送文本或电子邮件条目

专为记录回忆而生

• 那年今日功能让您可以回顾过去的回忆
• 标签、收藏夹和搜索筛选器使您可以轻松找到所需内容
• 地图视图可快速显示您在日记中记录的所有地点

*Day One 可永久免费使用，不限日记条目数量。 Day One 高级会员可享受其他功能，包括不限量的照片、视频和音频录制。 立即开始免费试用。

使用条款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技术帮助或其他查询，请访问 https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

cn.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

cn.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign
Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence

EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT
Access to exclusive offers and discounts!

AWARDS:
• Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018
• As featured on the Gadget Show
• Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024
• App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019
• Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App
• DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year"

CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com

This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

Requires account creation to access content.

*Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full
**Pass Guarantee T&C’s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

cn.description:
《TA》自上线以来，已成功配对了几十万对！他们从最开始的相遇，再慢慢相恋。

很多人找不到对象的真正原因是缺乏认识异性的途径，《TA》正是一条认识异性的好途径。

《TA》会根据年龄、学历、兴趣爱好等维度进行配对，把最合适两人配成一对，再进行一对一聊天。

每个APP都有一个定位，《TA》的定位是【靠谱】。如果你想找到男朋友、女朋友、结婚对象，那欢迎你。

如在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请联系我们：
- 在线帮助：在TA中选择“我” -> “意见反馈”
- 邮件服务：shiyixin0420@163.com（如果是帐号问题，请在邮件中注明出问题的帐号）

- TA提供按月、按季、按年三种周期订阅。

Dumb Phone 是一款极简的应用程序启动器，旨在通过保持主屏幕整洁、无通知来帮助你减少屏幕使用时间。

cn.description:
应用程序提供Mac或PC的远程控制，有鼠标、键盘和媒体控制。如果你把电脑连接到电视或投影仪上，从沙发或床上进行控制，那就太好了。

2013年，我创建了这个应用程序，以控制我的Mac Mini连接到客厅的大屏幕电视上。2016年，我辞去工作，成为一名独立开发者，现在我唯一的重点是建立我的应用程序。多年来，这款应用的下载量已超过200万次，并获得了良好的评价。

主要特点
- 遥控鼠标和键盘
- 流行应用程序和网站的媒体控制
- 实时查看你的电脑屏幕
- 系统命令：关机、重启、睡眠，等等。
- 启动和退出应用程序
- 使用Siri来控制你的电脑
- 控制声音输出/屏幕镜像[仅适用于Mac]

高级功能
- 创建控制面板
- 使用 AppleScript / PowerShell 添加自定义操作

简单快捷的设置
- 从https://cherpake.com/get，安装免费的辅助应用程序
- 将两台设备连接到同一网络

安全性
该应用程序使用标准的安全措施，如HTTPS进行通信，并且只在您的本地网络中工作。每当一个未知的设备试图与你的电脑建立连接时，该应用程序就会出现一个对话框，让你选择允许或拒绝它。

需要的条件
- 使用macOS 10.10或更新版本的苹果电脑
- 使用Windows 7 SP1或更新版本的电脑
- 最新的辅助应用程序（可在https://cherpake.com/get）。
- 共享的网络连接（WiFi或个人热点），见https://cherpake.com/connect

免费试用
这个应用程序是一个隐藏的宝石，大多数人都不知道他们需要。这不是我说的，只是一个最新的应用程序评论。仍然不相信，请下载并安装免费的应用程序，并使用免费试用来看看它自己。可在https://bit.ly/mpcrc

cn.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

hk.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.

Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

hk.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.releaseNotes:
1、新增 霸業劇本『猛虎嘯野 · 江東歸心』
孫堅戰歿後，孫策暫投袁術，渡江開啟霸業。玩家將扮演孫策勢力，深入體驗平江東過程中發生的一系列事件。
● 新增「特殊地點」設定：本次劇本中，江東五郡（廬江、豫章、會稽、吳、秣陵）僅可透過完成「霸業傳」指定任務佔領，佔領江東五郡後可在特殊地點「丹徒」挑戰最終boss「於吉」；
● 新增「霸業傳」玩法：預設孫策平江東主線與支線事件框架，主公們可體驗多個歷史主線與支線事件，事件結果也將動態影響勢力版圖變化；
● 新增「BOSS現身條件」設定：在特殊關卡「於吉討伐戰」中，引入全新玩法，主公們需要先破除妖術，使boss現身；
● 新增「宿將覺醒」機制：在特殊關卡「於吉討伐戰」中成功破除妖術，我方孫策將覺醒隱藏力量，直面宿命之敵於吉，親手改寫殞命的歷史！

2、新增 三級陣形系統：“陣法”、“外觀”
● 點將台優化：將兵書、指揮技等入口增設至武將介面，點選武將即可前往對應頁面；
● 自由打造武將：玩家可在「陣法」系統中獲得不同傾向的詞條屬性，自由自訂戰術核心武將；
● 陣形外觀升級：「外觀」中擁有更精細的模型設計與加成效果，玩家可依戰場需求即時切換陣形，適配更多戰場需求。

3.新增『丹青閣』活動
滾滾長江東逝水，浪花淘盡英雄。我們將沿著三國歷史脈絡，從黃巾起義啟程，逐步將三國時期大小戰役悉數呈現於『丹青閣』之中，力求還原波瀾壯闊的三國史詩畫面。
● 主題化集卡：卡牌以三國事件為主題，本次活動以『漢末風雲集』為主題，推出9張事件繪卷，每張繪卷包含10枚殘片；
● 社交性玩法：開放卡片贈送 / 申請功能，協助快速收集；

4、新增 指揮武將『大橋』
●解鎖指揮技功能後，完成大橋指揮技解鎖戰鬥即可開啟;
● 大橋指揮技可對敵人造成「焚燒」效果，大幅降低敵人屬性，影響戰局走向，豐富戰場策略玩法！號

5、新增特種兵：『璇璣營』
● 可透過「治所」內「兵營」解鎖取得；
● 璇璣營可透過專屬技能激勵友方單位，其光環效果可大幅提升我軍作戰能力；

6、開啟 仲夏戰令；
7、最佳化 部分戰場設定與美術表現：
8、優化 部分文本的描述；
9、修復和優化部分已知問題。
hk.description:
這是我們開發的一款單機向SLG
借鑒和學習了《三國志》、《霸王的大陸》系列，
內容豐富耐玩，上手後極易沉迷，
遊戲沒有大額付費，就算不付費也可以愉快的玩幾十個小時。
但由於難度較高，強烈不建議新手上來就挑戰困難難度。

【遊戲特點】
豐富的戰鬥陣形和技能，
在戰斗場景中山河、湖泊、城關等不同地形上有變化多端的戰術組合，
加上天氣系統對戰局的影響，使得戰場玩法極具特色。

根據面對敵人的情況不同，
不同戰術可以形成各自的打法流派，
常見的如搶城速攻流、近戰突擊流，單挑控制流、遠射連珠流等等。

數十萬字原創遊戲文本，全部源自製作團隊對相關史料的分析提煉，
各種武將列傳、軼事；各地的背景介紹，皆有可靠的依據出處。
玩家玩遊戲的同時能感受到那個時代的文化氣息、社會風貌，
從更豐富的層面帶玩家領略濃厚的歷史人文精神。

【玩家攻略社区】 
Facebook:三國志天下布武 

Line:sanguo15



【為什麼選擇開發這款遊戲】
我從小便沉迷於《霸王的大陸》和光榮的《三國志》，
但市面上很難找到類似玩法的手機遊戲。
於是我做了一個，只是沒想到，這個歷程是如此的艱難。

我常常跟同是做這類產品的朋友浪子交流，他說《漢末霸業》一路走來，一樣殊為不易，在這個年代想要有自己的堅持，必須付出相當的代價。

經常有朋友問我，“為什麼不去做別的更賺錢的遊戲？”
的確，我們的這款遊戲不怎麼賺錢，
不充值都可以玩的很開心，充個幾十能嗨皮幾個月。

朋友的這個問題，是對我的靈魂拷問。
因為我的年紀已經不小了，拖家帶口的，這個問題必須正視。
但朋友說的“那種賺錢的遊戲”，我不喜歡。

朋友不理解我對這種遊戲的感情。
在那個網吧還只有局域網的年代，
這個品類的遊戲伴著我度過了無數個日日夜夜。
為了統一全國殫精竭慮，以至於茶飯不思、夙夜難眠。
那時的我，是沉浸的，是幸福的。
而現在，我有機會能利用我的專業技能把這種感受發揚光大。
把我自己對這種遊戲的理解傾注到產品之中，
置於更大的平台之上，
讓更多跟我同樣喜歡這類游戲的玩家體會到這種快樂，
這是一種使命，一種榮譽。

能做這個遊戲，是我人生中最幸福的事情。
我還有很多關於它的想法，已經在心頭縈繞多年，
我想要呈現的，還遠不止之前大家曾看到的。
如果能賺錢，我會把這個遊戲一直做下去。
如果賺不到，我就先去做點別的，用賺來的錢把這個遊戲繼續做下去。

逝水東流，青山依舊，是非成敗，任人評說。
我素未謀面的朋友們，祝你們玩得開心。



——遊戲製作人：奶牛

hk.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：
聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com
在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames
訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

hk.trackCensoredName: Forest 專注森林 - 讀書專注番茄鐘
hk.description:
## 136 國家中排名第一名的生產力工具 app；超過兩百萬付費用戶的專注神器
## 我們的用戶在世界各地種下超過 1,500,000 棵真樹
## 簡單有趣的方式幫助您保持專注，培養高效率的生活習慣
    
紐約時報：「如果你想要放下手機、專注當下，真誠地和你的家人朋友們渡過相聚的時光，Forest 是你的最佳選擇。」
    
數位時代：「好的習慣必須要一段時間養成，要改善低頭族、不時會滑手機的症狀也不是一天兩天，記得多多使用這款App來幫助你改掉壞習慣，重新找回專注的自己。」
    
不論你是在圖書館讀書或是在辦公室上班，每當你希望有一段專心工作或學習的時間，你可以在 Forest 中種下一顆種子。在接下來的時間內，這顆種子將會慢慢地成長為一棵大樹。若是你禁不起誘惑，在這段時間內離開這個 app，你充滿生機、可愛的小樹將會枯萎而死。每一天，你都會有一片森林種滿了你今天所有茁壯的大樹，每一棵樹都代表了你曾經努力的時光。伴隨著畫面中生長的小樹，成就感以及責任感將會幫助你暫時離開手機，全心投入到手邊的工作，建立高效率與專注的生活習慣。 #治療拖延症 #提升時間效率 #遇見心流 #戒除手機成癮
    
保持專注，拒當低頭族！
    
保持專注：
• 基於番茄工作法（番茄鐘）把時間抓回自己手中
• 種植漂亮的小樹，並專注於生活中更重要的事情上
• 因應不同專注情境，自訂你的應用程式允許名單，種樹時名單外的 App 將會被屏蔽（iOS 16 以上）
• 用你專注的時光，一點一滴茁壯你的森林
    
滿滿的成就感：
• 和朋友們分享你的成果並與全世界的使用者一同競賽
• 用專注的時光累積 Forest 金幣，解鎖超過 90 種精心設計的大樹、灌木及背景白噪音
• 與家人、好友一起，開始一局種樹挑戰
• 達成成就獲得額外獎勵
• 在保持專心的同時，與 Trees for the Future 一起為世界種下真正的樹苗
    
歷史回顧：
• 自定義任務標籤，讓你花在各個任務的時間分配一目瞭然，幫助助你自主時間管理
• 回顧你一週、一個月甚至一整年累積的大森林
• 可追蹤你每日的手機使用時數與頻率
• 以時間軸的形式回顧你在 Forest 經歷的專注旅程
• 將你的專心時間記錄在蘋果健康 App
    
現在就放下手機，種出專屬自己的專注森林！
    
注意事項：
• Forest 是一個 iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch 通用的應用程式，買一次即可在不同 iOS 設備上使用。於 iPhone, iPad 能使用上述提及的完整功能，於 Apple Watch 可提供查看今日專注紀錄以及顯示即時專注狀態。若要下載/解鎖其他非 iOS 平台的版本需要另外購買，不過只要登入同一個 Forest 帳號，你的帳號資料便可以在不同平台的設備間同步。
• 由於 iOS 系統限制，允許名單功能需要 iOS/iPadOS 16 以上才能使用。iOS/iPadOS 15 以下的裝置無法使用允許名單，在種樹時離開 Forest 會導致小樹枯萎。
 • 種植真樹功能因為預算限制，每個帳號最多只能兌換五棵真樹。除此之外，我們時常會有一些限時活動可以種植更多的真樹，請記得關注我們的社交平台訊息，或是 app 內部通知。
 • Forest 在 App Store 上僅有此唯一版本，其他雷同或是刻意假冒 Forest 的軟體皆不是本團隊開發的產品，感謝您對於原創者的支持！
    
你可以在這些社群平台找到我們：：
在 Facebook 給我們個讚: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
在 Twitter 跟隨我們: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
在 Instagram 追蹤我們: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/
    
我們還有提供瀏覽器的擴充套件，立即前往 www.forestapp.cc 查看吧！
    
- 音效設計 : Shi Kuang Lee

hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

hk.description:
體育實況。音樂。新聞。播客。

TuneIn 是一個應用程式，它彙集了來自世界各地的實況體育、音樂、新聞、播客和電臺。

只需動動手指即可存取世界上最大的即時、點播和原創音訊庫，聆聽對您來說最重要的訊息，發現讓您感動的新時刻。

透過體育實況、獨家音樂頻道、快速發佈的新聞、全球超過 570 萬個播客和超過 100,000 個廣播電臺，您隨時都能聽到令您驚喜的內容。

TuneIn Premium 使用者可以收聽 Fox News Radio 的無廣告新聞以及各種不間斷的無廣告音樂電臺。

下載 TuneIn 的五大理由：

1.不錯過一場體育賽事實況
您可以在工作場所、家中、健身房和路上聆聽。即時收聽體育講座 - 基本上在任何您可以收聽和點播的地方。

2.聽不完的音樂
永遠不用擔心只能選擇由著名 DJ、有影響力的時尚先鋒和特邀嘉賓策劃的獨家音樂電臺播放的下一首歌曲。發現每個流派的最佳新歌和藝術家，以及您最喜歡的所有歌曲和藝術家。

3.全方位的爆炸性新聞
收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。

4.您最喜愛的所有播客
從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。

5.世界上最強大的電臺
您的 FM 撥盤做不到這一點！ 播放世界各地的 100,000+ AM、FM 和網路電臺的節目。 目前流行於 [ ]:[ ]。

不僅僅是在您的 iPhone 上
TuneIn 可在 200 個平台和連接裝置上免費使用。在您鍛煉時透過 Apple Watch 播放音樂。按一下 TuneIn for CarPlay 以便在您駕車回家的路上玩遊戲。透過 Google Home、Amazon Echo 和 Alexa 讓您的播客伴您左右。


升級到 TuneIn Premium 獲得完整的體驗
• 無廣告音樂
• 無廣告新聞
• 今天的最佳播客
• 100,000 個電臺


透過應用程式訂閱 TuneIn Radio Premium。如果您選擇訂閱，則將根據您所在的國家/地區按月收取訂閱費。在您完成付款之前，訂閱費將顯示在應用程式中。您的訂閱將按當時的訂閱費每月自動續訂，除非在目前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂。您的 iTunes 帳戶將在目前時段結束前 24 小時內自動扣費。訂閱費將按月收取。您可以隨時透過 iTunes 帳戶設定關閉自動續訂。

隱私政策：http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
使用條款：http://tunein.com/policies/

TuneIn 使用 Nielsen 測量軟體，該軟體使您能夠為諸如 Nielsen 的 TV Ratings 等市場研究做貢獻。要瞭解關於 Neilsen 的產品和您的隱私的更多資訊，請瀏覽 http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy。

hk.description:
應用程序通過鼠標、鍵盤和媒體控件為 Mac 或 PC 提供遠程控制。如果您將計算機連接到電視或投影儀，以便從沙發或床上進行控制，那就太好了。

2013 年，我創建了這個應用程序來控制連接到客廳大屏幕電視的 Mac Mini。 2016 年，我辭掉了工作，成為了一名獨立開發者，現在我唯一的重點是構建我的應用程序。多年來，該應用程序的下載量已超過 2,000,000 次，並獲得好評。

主要特點
· 遙控鼠標和鍵盤
· 流行應用程序和網站的媒體控制

· 將兩台設備連接到同一個網絡

安全
該應用程序使用 HTTPS 等標準安全措施進行通信，並且僅適用於您的本地網絡。每當未知設備嘗試與您的計算機建立連接時，該應用程序都會顯示一個對話框供您選擇允許或拒絕它。

要求
· 裝有 macOS 10.10 或更高版本的 Mac
· 裝有 Windows 7 SP1 或更新版本的電腦
· 最新的助手應用程序（可在 https://cherpake.com/get 獲得）
· 共享網絡連接（WiFi 或個人熱點），請參閱 https://cherpake.com/connect

免費試用
這個應用程序是一個隱藏的寶石，大多數人不知道他們需要。這些不是我的話，只是最新的應用評論之一。仍然不服氣，下載並安裝免費應用程序並使用免費試用版親自查看。可在 https://bit.ly/mpcrc

mo.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

mo.releaseNotes: Added support for sharing the app via QR code.
mo.description:
這個應用程序有一個簡單的功能：檢測靈體的存在並捕捉它們。
一旦捕獲，它會顯示東方佛教的六字箴言作為保護和祝福用戶的形式。

• 這個應用程序可能會嚇到你。
• 所有傳感器都在一個頁面上。
• 一個真正的雷達來追踪異常。
• 高精度的EMF（電磁場）探測器。
• 拍照並檢測其中的異常 - 可以自由開啟或關閉。
• 更詳細的說明在應用程序中可用；只需觸摸?按鈕即可訪問它們。

警告：
如果您是一個非常敏感或容易受到驚嚇的個體，請考慮不使用這個應用程序並將其關閉。在使用此應用程序時，請不要將自己置於危險中。如果您認為自己處於危險之中，請立即關閉應用程序，聯繫某人尋求幫助，並立即離開該地區。

免責聲明：
請記住，由於應用程序使用設備的不同傳感器，因此我們不能保證任何鬼魂檢測的準確性，這在很大程度上取決於終端的精度和質量。由於超自然活動無法用科學證明，我們不能保證該應用程序與真實的靈魂進行通信。這個應用程序的結果無法得到科學驗證。

mo.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：
聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com
在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames
訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲

國際標準化組織
快門速度

mo.description:
應用程序通過鼠標、鍵盤和媒體控件為 Mac 或 PC 提供遠程控制。如果您將計算機連接到電視或投影儀，以便從沙發或床上進行控制，那就太好了。

2013 年，我創建了這個應用程序來控制連接到客廳大屏幕電視的 Mac Mini。 2016 年，我辭掉了工作，成為了一名獨立開發者，現在我唯一的重點是構建我的應用程序。多年來，該應用程序的下載量已超過 2,000,000 次，並獲得好評。

主要特點
· 遙控鼠標和鍵盤
· 流行應用程序和網站的媒體控制
· 實時查看您的電腦屏幕
· 系統指令：關機、重啟、休眠等。
· 啟動和退出應用程序
· 使用 Siri 控制您的電腦
·控制聲音輸出/屏幕鏡像[僅限Mac]

高級功能
· 創建控制面板
· 使用 AppleScript / PowerShell 添加自定義操作

快速簡便的設置
· 從 https://cherpake.com/get 安裝免費的助手應用程序
· 將兩台設備連接到同一個網絡

安全
該應用程序使用 HTTPS 等標準安全措施進行通信，並且僅適用於您的本地網絡。每當未知設備嘗試與您的計算機建立連接時，該應用程序都會顯示一個對話框供您選擇允許或拒絕它。

要求
· 裝有 macOS 10.10 或更高版本的 Mac
· 裝有 Windows 7 SP1 或更新版本的電腦
· 最新的助手應用程序（可在 https://cherpake.com/get 獲得）
· 共享網絡連接（WiFi 或個人熱點），請參閱 https://cherpake.com/connect

免費試用
這個應用程序是一個隱藏的寶石，大多數人不知道他們需要。這些不是我的話，只是最新的應用評論之一。仍然不服氣，下載並安裝免費應用程序並使用免費試用版親自查看。可在 https://bit.ly/mpcrc

tw.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day

November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。

添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。

使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！
超過100種創意字體可供選擇！
可以翻譯超過59種語言！

特徵：
•具有創意字體的全鍵盤。
•創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。
•在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。
•更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。*
•設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。*
•將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。
•保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。
•選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。
•更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小
•將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。*
•語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。*
•使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。
•只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。
•商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！

還：
•在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。
•單擊即可共享您的位置。
•在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。*
•從大量字體中選擇。*
•自定義字體大小。*
•自定義字體顏色。*
•使用“安全”類別保護短語。
•使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。
•使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。
•直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。
•直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。
•創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。
•使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。

（*）需要有效的訂閱

記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。
（僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。

tw.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tw.trackName: 三國志天下布武 - 單機戰棋策略遊戲
tw.releaseNotes:
1、新增 霸業劇本『猛虎嘯野 · 江東歸心』
孫堅戰歿後，孫策暫投袁術，渡江開啟霸業。玩家將扮演孫策勢力，深入體驗平江東過程中發生的一系列事件。
● 新增「特殊地點」設定：本次劇本中，江東五郡（廬江、豫章、會稽、吳、秣陵）僅可透過完成「霸業傳」指定任務佔領，佔領江東五郡後可在特殊地點「丹徒」挑戰最終boss「於吉」；
● 新增「霸業傳」玩法：預設孫策平江東主線與支線事件框架，主公們可體驗多個歷史主線與支線事件，事件結果也將動態影響勢力版圖變化；
● 新增「BOSS現身條件」設定：在特殊關卡「於吉討伐戰」中，引入全新玩法，主公們需要先破除妖術，使boss現身；
● 新增「宿將覺醒」機制：在特殊關卡「於吉討伐戰」中成功破除妖術，我方孫策將覺醒隱藏力量，直面宿命之敵於吉，親手改寫殞命的歷史！

2、新增 三級陣形系統：“陣法”、“外觀”
● 點將台優化：將兵書、指揮技等入口增設至武將介面，點選武將即可前往對應頁面；
● 自由打造武將：玩家可在「陣法」系統中獲得不同傾向的詞條屬性，自由自訂戰術核心武將；
● 陣形外觀升級：「外觀」中擁有更精細的模型設計與加成效果，玩家可依戰場需求即時切換陣形，適配更多戰場需求。

3.新增『丹青閣』活動
滾滾長江東逝水，浪花淘盡英雄。我們將沿著三國歷史脈絡，從黃巾起義啟程，逐步將三國時期大小戰役悉數呈現於『丹青閣』之中，力求還原波瀾壯闊的三國史詩畫面。
● 主題化集卡：卡牌以三國事件為主題，本次活動以『漢末風雲集』為主題，推出9張事件繪卷，每張繪卷包含10枚殘片；
● 社交性玩法：開放卡片贈送 / 申請功能，協助快速收集；

4、新增 指揮武將『大橋』
●解鎖指揮技功能後，完成大橋指揮技解鎖戰鬥即可開啟;
● 大橋指揮技可對敵人造成「焚燒」效果，大幅降低敵人屬性，影響戰局走向，豐富戰場策略玩法！號

5、新增特種兵：『璇璣營』
● 可透過「治所」內「兵營」解鎖取得；
● 璇璣營可透過專屬技能激勵友方單位，其光環效果可大幅提升我軍作戰能力；

6、開啟 仲夏戰令；
7、最佳化 部分戰場設定與美術表現：
8、優化 部分文本的描述；
9、修復和優化部分已知問題。
tw.description:
這是我們開發的一款單機向SLG
借鑒和學習了《三國志》、《霸王的大陸》系列，
內容豐富耐玩，上手後極易沉迷，
遊戲沒有大額付費，就算不付費也可以愉快的玩幾十個小時。
但由於難度較高，強烈不建議新手上來就挑戰困難難度。

【遊戲特點】
豐富的戰鬥陣形和技能，
在戰斗場景中山河、湖泊、城關等不同地形上有變化多端的戰術組合，
加上天氣系統對戰局的影響，使得戰場玩法極具特色。

根據面對敵人的情況不同，
不同戰術可以形成各自的打法流派，
常見的如搶城速攻流、近戰突擊流，單挑控制流、遠射連珠流等等。

數十萬字原創遊戲文本，全部源自製作團隊對相關史料的分析提煉，
各種武將列傳、軼事；各地的背景介紹，皆有可靠的依據出處。
玩家玩遊戲的同時能感受到那個時代的文化氣息、社會風貌，
從更豐富的層面帶玩家領略濃厚的歷史人文精神。

【玩家攻略社区】 
Facebook:三國志天下布武 

Line:sanguo15



【為什麼選擇開發這款遊戲】
我從小便沉迷於《霸王的大陸》和光榮的《三國志》，
但市面上很難找到類似玩法的手機遊戲。
於是我做了一個，只是沒想到，這個歷程是如此的艱難。

我常常跟同是做這類產品的朋友浪子交流，他說《漢末霸業》一路走來，一樣殊為不易，在這個年代想要有自己的堅持，必須付出相當的代價。

經常有朋友問我，“為什麼不去做別的更賺錢的遊戲？”
的確，我們的這款遊戲不怎麼賺錢，
不充值都可以玩的很開心，充個幾十能嗨皮幾個月。

朋友的這個問題，是對我的靈魂拷問。
因為我的年紀已經不小了，拖家帶口的，這個問題必須正視。
但朋友說的“那種賺錢的遊戲”，我不喜歡。

朋友不理解我對這種遊戲的感情。
在那個網吧還只有局域網的年代，
這個品類的遊戲伴著我度過了無數個日日夜夜。
為了統一全國殫精竭慮，以至於茶飯不思、夙夜難眠。
那時的我，是沉浸的，是幸福的。
而現在，我有機會能利用我的專業技能把這種感受發揚光大。
把我自己對這種遊戲的理解傾注到產品之中，
置於更大的平台之上，
讓更多跟我同樣喜歡這類游戲的玩家體會到這種快樂，
這是一種使命，一種榮譽。

能做這個遊戲，是我人生中最幸福的事情。
我還有很多關於它的想法，已經在心頭縈繞多年，
我想要呈現的，還遠不止之前大家曾看到的。
如果能賺錢，我會把這個遊戲一直做下去。
如果賺不到，我就先去做點別的，用賺來的錢把這個遊戲繼續做下去。

逝水東流，青山依舊，是非成敗，任人評說。
我素未謀面的朋友們，祝你們玩得開心。



——遊戲製作人：奶牛

tw.description:
體育實況。音樂。新聞。播客。

TuneIn 是一個應用程式，它彙集了來自世界各地的實況體育、音樂、新聞、播客和電臺。

只需動動手指即可存取世界上最大的即時、點播和原創音訊庫，聆聽對您來說最重要的訊息，發現讓您感動的新時刻。

透過體育實況、獨家音樂頻道、快速發佈的新聞、全球超過 570 萬個播客和超過 100,000 個廣播電臺，您隨時都能聽到令您驚喜的內容。

TuneIn Premium 使用者可以收聽 Fox News Radio 的無廣告新聞以及各種不間斷的無廣告音樂電臺。

下載 TuneIn 的五大理由：

1.不錯過一場體育賽事實況
您可以在工作場所、家中、健身房和路上聆聽。即時收聽體育講座 - 基本上在任何您可以收聽和點播的地方。

2.聽不完的音樂
永遠不用擔心只能選擇由著名 DJ、有影響力的時尚先鋒和特邀嘉賓策劃的獨家音樂電臺播放的下一首歌曲。發現每個流派的最佳新歌和藝術家，以及您最喜歡的所有歌曲和藝術家。

3.全方位的爆炸性新聞
收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。

4.您最喜愛的所有播客
從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。

5.世界上最強大的電臺
您的 FM 撥盤做不到這一點！ 播放世界各地的 100,000+ AM、FM 和網路電臺的節目。 目前流行於 [ ]:[ ]。

不僅僅是在您的 iPhone 上
TuneIn 可在 200 個平台和連接裝置上免費使用。在您鍛煉時透過 Apple Watch 播放音樂。按一下 TuneIn for CarPlay 以便在您駕車回家的路上玩遊戲。透過 Google Home、Amazon Echo 和 Alexa 讓您的播客伴您左右。


升級到 TuneIn Premium 獲得完整的體驗
• 無廣告音樂
• 無廣告新聞
• 今天的最佳播客
• 100,000 個電臺


透過應用程式訂閱 TuneIn Radio Premium。如果您選擇訂閱，則將根據您所在的國家/地區按月收取訂閱費。在您完成付款之前，訂閱費將顯示在應用程式中。您的訂閱將按當時的訂閱費每月自動續訂，除非在目前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂。您的 iTunes 帳戶將在目前時段結束前 24 小時內自動扣費。訂閱費將按月收取。您可以隨時透過 iTunes 帳戶設定關閉自動續訂。

隱私政策：http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
使用條款：http://tunein.com/policies/

TuneIn 使用 Nielsen 測量軟體，該軟體使您能夠為諸如 Nielsen 的 TV Ratings 等市場研究做貢獻。要瞭解關於 Neilsen 的產品和您的隱私的更多資訊，請瀏覽 http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy。

tw.trackName: 手錶變身器：時空驅動器 - iWatch發聲器
tw.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

tw.description:
重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：
聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com
在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames
訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

tw.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tw.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

tw.description:
應用程序通過鼠標、鍵盤和媒體控件為 Mac 或 PC 提供遠程控制。如果您將計算機連接到電視或投影儀，以便從沙發或床上進行控制，那就太好了。

2013 年，我創建了這個應用程序來控制連接到客廳大屏幕電視的 Mac Mini。 2016 年，我辭掉了工作，成為了一名獨立開發者，現在我唯一的重點是構建我的應用程序。多年來，該應用程序的下載量已超過 2,000,000 次，並獲得好評。

主要特點
· 遙控鼠標和鍵盤
· 流行應用程序和網站的媒體控制
· 實時查看您的電腦屏幕
· 系統指令：關機、重啟、休眠等。
· 啟動和退出應用程序

us.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

us.description:
IMPORTANT 
DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch

Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff’s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions – and try to keep out of prison yourself! – in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat.

Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It’s all of these, and more!

Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience.
Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn’t spiral out of control.

Take charge of the Sheriff’s department.
Your subordinates aren’t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices – and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You’ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department.

Engage in tactical combat.
During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment – if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn’t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life.

Become a true detective.
Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought.

Thank you for playing ‘THIS IS THE POLICE 2’!

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

Please visit our web site for more information.

More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. us.description:
App offers remote control for Mac or PC, with a mouse, keyboard, and media controls. Great if you connect your computer to the TV or projector, to control from a sofa or bed.

In 2013, I created this app to control my Mac Mini connected to a big-screen TV in my living room. In 2016 I quit my job and became an indie developer, and now my sole focus is on building my apps. The app has been downloaded more than 2,000,000 times over the years and has favorable reviews.

MAIN FEATURES
· Remote Mouse and Keyboard
· Media Controls for popular apps and websites
· Live view of your computer screen
· System Commands: shut down, restart, sleep, etc.
· Launch and Quit apps
· Use Siri to control your computer
· Control Sound Output / Screen Mirroring [Mac only]

ADVANCED FEATURES
· Create Control Panels
· Add Custom Actions using AppleScript / PowerShell

QUICK AND EASY SETUP
· Install the free helper app from https://cherpake.com/get
· Connect both devices to the same network

SECURITY
The app uses standard security measures like HTTPS to communicate and only works on your local network. Whenever an unknown device tries to establish a connection with your computer,  the app presents a dialog for you to choose to allow or deny it.

REQUIREMENTS
· Mac with macOS 10.10 or newer
· PC with Windows 7 SP1 or newer
· Latest helper app (available at https://cherpake.com/get)

FREE TRIAL

us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

us.description:
---The Train Station---
Explore one of Playtime Co.'s most popular locations, the Game Station! This Train Station is more than just a pitstop... there's games, a playground, and much, much more. Even better- the train provides a straight shot right out of the factory.

---New Toys---
This factory is filled with remnants of a crooked past- All you need to do is go deeper. Let's ask Bunzo Bunny. Or perhaps PJ Pug-a-pillar has some ideas. Or maybe... Mommy knows?

---The Green Hand---
The all-new Green Hand has been introduced into the GrabPack family! You can now carry power with you, remotely! That's not all... you can grapple now too! Innovation has done it again.



• Transfer power without the confines of a wire!
• Grab onto pipes and swing across missing flooring.
• Fly! Kind of- you can grapple straight up, more accurately.

Playtime's not over yet- stick around...

us.description:
You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.


---Welcome to Playtime Co.!---
Playtime Co. was once the king of the toy manufacturing industry... until everybody inside of the factory one day disappeared into thin air. Now, years later, you must explore the abandoned factory and uncover the truth.

---The Toys---
The toys of Playtime Co. are a lively bunch! From Bot to Huggy, Catbee to Poppy, Playtime does it all! As long as you're at Playtime Co., why not pay the toys a little visit? You might just make a few friends...

---The GrabPack---
This amazing GrabPack is a wearable backpack, accompanied by 2 artificial hands attached via steel wire. With this handy, state-of-the-art tool, there's no limit to what Playtime Co. employees can accomplish! The following list of features should help to show you what the GrabPack has to offer.

- The hands' powerful grip allows for movement of heavy objects with ease!
- A lengthy and flexible wire gives any employee the ability to reach whatever they may need, no matter the distance!
- The steel wire makes conducting electricity a breeze!

The only limit is the length of your GrabPack's wire.



Won't you stick around? There's lots of fun in store for you. It's almost Playtime...

tr.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)
April 22 — Earth Day
May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity
June 5 — World Environment Day
June 8 — World Oceans Day
June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

tr.description:
This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. 
Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user.

• This application might scare you.
• All sensors are on one page.
• A real radar to track anomalies.
• Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector.
• Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off.
• More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them.

Warning:
If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately.

Disclaimer:
Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

tr.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

tr.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tr.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

√ Carpenter's level
√ Supports iPhone and iPad

Level. URL scheme is "EWBubbleLevel://"

Whether you prefer dark or light mode, this launcher works well with both, allowing you to choose the view that suits you best.

Stay focused and simplify your digital life with Dumb Phone.

tr.description:
IMPORTANT 
DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch

Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff’s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions – and try to keep out of prison yourself! – in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat.

Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It’s all of these, and more!

Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience.
Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn’t spiral out of control.

Take charge of the Sheriff’s department.
Your subordinates aren’t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices – and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You’ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department.

Engage in tactical combat.
During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment – if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn’t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life.

Become a true detective.
Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought.

Thank you for playing ‘THIS IS THE POLICE 2’!

tr.description:
## Top productivity app in 136 countries. More than 2 million satisfied paying users. Featured in Apple's "Amazing Apps" TV commercial.
## Staying focused with the cutest gamified timer. 
## Over 1,500,000 real trees were planted on Earth by our users.  

"Forest works well, and if your goal is to be more in the moment, ignore your phone and actually talk to your friends when you are with them, this is the app for you."— The New York Times 

"In order to establish new, better habits, it's helpful to engage with tools that make it easier to reinforce them. For anyone looking to curtail their phone usage, the Forest app might be for you."— Business Insider

If you want to temporarily put down your phone and focus on what’s more important in real life, you can plant a seed in Forest. As time goes by, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. 

The sense of achievement and responsibility will encourage you to stay away from your phone, and will help you make better use of your time. Stop getting distracted by your phone, make you self-motivated and get more things done.

Stay focused, Be present! 

STAY FOCUSED
• A interesting way to help you beat phone addiction and overcome distraction
• Turn your focused moments into a lush forest.
• Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked. (iOS 16 or above)

GET MOTIVATED
• Earn rewards and unlock more than 90 new tree species and white noises.
• Share your forest and compete with friends and users around the world.
• Plant trees along with friends & family.
• Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards.
• Plant real trees on Earth and protect the environment with tree-planting organization Trees for the Future.

STATISTICS
• Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution.
• Browse your weekly, monthly and even your yearly big forest.
• Track your focused time in the Apple Health App.
• Track your daily phone usage and screen time.
• Recall memories of your planting journey with our brand new Forest Timeline!

It's never too late to build up productive habits! 

NOTICE
• Forest is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch, and can be used across these iOS devices with a one-time purchase. The full app with the aforementioned features is available on iPhone and iPad; on Apple Watch you can view live planting session and today’s focus stats. To download or unlock a non-iOS version, it requires a separate purchase. By logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
• Due to iOS limitations, the Allow List feature is only available on iOS/iPadOS 16 or above. If you’re using a device running iOS/iPadOS 15 or below, your tree will wither when you leave Forest during a planting session.
• Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. We will be introducing limited time events that will allow users to plant more real trees. Please follow our social media page or check the in-app announcement for more updates.
• There is only one version of Forest on the App Store. Other apps that are similar and mimics Forest are not developed by the Forest team. Thank you for your support!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/

We also provide browser extensions. Find out more on www.forestapp.cc

tr.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

tr.description:
App offers remote control for Mac or PC, with a mouse, keyboard, and media controls. Great if you connect your computer to the TV or projector, to control from a sofa or bed.

In 2013, I created this app to control my Mac Mini connected to a big-screen TV in my living room. In 2016 I quit my job and became an indie developer, and now my sole focus is on building my apps. The app has been downloaded more than 2,000,000 times over the years and has favorable reviews.

MAIN FEATURES
· Remote Mouse and Keyboard
· Media Controls for popular apps and websites
· Live view of your computer screen
· System Commands: shut down, restart, sleep, etc.
· Launch and Quit apps
· Use Siri to control your computer
· Control Sound Output / Screen Mirroring [Mac only]

ADVANCED FEATURES
· Create Control Panels
· Add Custom Actions using AppleScript / PowerShell

QUICK AND EASY SETUP
· Install the free helper app from https://cherpake.com/get
· Connect both devices to the same network

SECURITY
The app uses standard security measures like HTTPS to communicate and only works on your local network. Whenever an unknown device tries to establish a connection with your computer,  the app presents a dialog for you to choose to allow or deny it.

REQUIREMENTS
· Mac with macOS 10.10 or newer
· PC with Windows 7 SP1 or newer
· Latest helper app (available at https://cherpake.com/get)
· Shared network connection (WiFi or Personal Hotspot), see https://cherpake.com/connect

FREE TRIAL
This app is a hidden gem that most people don't know they need. Those are not my words, just one of the latest app reviews. Still not convinced, download and install the free app and use the free trial to see it yourself. Available at https://bit.ly/mpcrc
